Author: avoao
Text: Realizing this and typing it out is a beautiful first step to maybe not going back, but starting to reverse the damage. You're alive, you're cognizant, it's not too late to fix now. Can you go back to that dietitian? Can you call her? Can you look into other treatment options that might make it less likely for you to fall away again, like inpatient or another hospitalization? I know this really really sucks and I'm sorry you're dealing with it, but you still have the power to turn it around. You reached out for help here, you can do it in real life, too. I believe in you ðŸ’— please stay safe.
